item.title: Rachel Zegler's Snow White Crosses Another Major Box Office Milestone During Its Fourth Weekend
item.description: Disney's live-action Snow White remake, which stars Rachel Zegler and Gal Gadot, passes a major box office milestone during its fourth weekend.

item.title: Netflix's Dungeons & Dragons Show Can't Use 1 Forgotten Realms Villain, No Matter How Perfect They Are
item.description: Szass Tam worked as the enemy pulling strings in Honor Among Thieves, but using him in Netflixâ€™s upcoming Forgotten Realms would be repetitive.

item.title: 10 Massive Stars Of The 1990s Who Seemingly Disappeared From Stardom
item.description: Many famous actors rose to prominence in the 1990s, but have seemingly disappeared from stardom today, barring an occasional role.
